contentrichtext.text: == Summary == Album cover for ''[[The Distance to Here]]' by [[Live (band)|Live]] ([http://www.sdcd.com/B2B/jsp/app/images/Scans/315112.jpg]).<br /> Designed by [[Stefan Sagmeister]].<br /> Album cover to illustrate album == Licensing == {{Non-free use rationale|Article=The Distance to Here |Description=Album cover |Source=Scan |Portion=Album cover only |Resolution=Yes |Purpose=To display the album's cover for its article's infobox and to illustrate and identify the album |Replaceability=None |other_information= }} {{non-free album cover|image has rationale=yes}}
